cscie160.hw1

Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie160.hw1.Elevator

  • public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
    Elevator Class will simulate the realworld Elevator system. It has implementation to drop the passengers to their destined floors upon request.
    Since:
    - 09/18/2012
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    KALPAN

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void boardPassengers(int... v)
      This method will board the passengers to the elevator.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Executing this main method will create an Elevator object at 1st floor.

      This method will move the elevator UP each floor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Elevator

        public Elevator()
        No argument constructor. It will construct an Elevator at the first floor with no passangers on board and direction set to UP

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
        This method will move the elevator UP each floor. If any passengers, destined for that floor,It will call stop Method. After reaching top floor it will return to the first floor. Prints status of elevator at each floor

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This method will stop the Elevator at current floor. It will decrease total no of passengers on board. Prints the status of the Elevator

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This Overridden method will print the status of the Elevator object. It will display its current floor, its moving direction and total Passengers on board.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • boardPassengers

        public void boardPassengers(int... v)
        This method will board the passengers to the elevator. by passing the requested destination floor in the argument for each passenger
        Parameters:
        v - destination floor - Separate the values by comma for each passenger

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Executing this main method will create an Elevator object at 1st floor. Take all the passengers from 1st floor. Move up going through each floor and then comes down. Elevator status will be displayed at each floor
